DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate safety effectiveness Endurant Stent Graft treatment Abdominal Aortic Aorto-Uni-Iliac Aneurysms .
DOC.brief_title: Endurant Bifurcated Aorto-Uni-Iliac ( AUI ) Stent Graft System
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , two-arm , non-randomized , multicenter clinical study enrol subject treat bifurcated stent graft one arm subject treat AUI second arm .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject ≥ 18 year old . 2 . Subject ( Subject 's legal representative ) understand voluntarily sign date Informed Consent document approve Sponsor Institutional Review Board . 3 . Subject able willing comply protocol undergo followup requirement . 4 . Subject suitable candidate elective surgical repair AAA evaluate American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) Physical Status Classification System I , II , III , IV 5 . Subject abdominal aortic aortoiliac aneurysm characteristic meet protocol parameter 6 . Subject meet protocol anatomical criteria* demonstrate contrastenhanced CT MRA 7 . Subject vascular dimension range size available Endurant Stent Graft 8 . Subject document image evidence least 1 patent iliac 1 femoral artery , tolerate vascular conduit allow introduction device . 9 . Subject 's native vessel anatomy suit introduction and/ deployment Endurant UniIliac Stent Graft System . 1 . Subject life expectancy < 1 year 2 . Subject participate another investigational drug device study 3 . Subject require emergent aneurysm treatment 4 . Subject female childbearing potential pregnancy exclude . 5 . Subject know hypersensitivity contraindication anticoagulant , antiplatelets , contrast medium , amenable pretreatment . 6 . Subject morbidly obese ( body mass index ≥ 40 kg/m2 ) document clinical condition severely inhibit radiographic visualization aorta .
